feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250516-2b8af698
entry.content:
• 9d9294b0 update to fix plex check pin request flow. by arabcoders
  • f73675de Reverted changes to plex ValidateToken by arabcoders
  • cd6bd635 Finalize Plex OAuth flow in Backend add. by arabcoders
  • 7c20a238 initial work to support plex oauth flow by arabcoders
  • fc903856 Refactor Plex headers handling by arabcoders
  • 157bcd45 With multi-user support, it doesn't make sense to log spam webhooks with invalid user ID, so we use Debug level instead and option to increase the level via debug_trace additional option by arabcoders
  • 66405cab Fix #670, tautulli will send lastViewedAt regardless if the item is marked as watched or not. by arabcoders
  • 1272d996 minor typo fixes by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • add conditions to Tautulli webhooks by @Splinter7914 in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/665
  • Migrate to user/pass auth by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/666
  • Use auth system instead of api key for WebUI by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/667
  • Fix Tautulli progress tracking by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/671
  • Finalize Plex OAuth flow in Backend add. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/672

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250513-57580fbc...master-20250516-2b8af698

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250518-1458e597
entry.content:
• d00c4b3e re-order frankenphp to be before copying the app. by arabcoders
  • ef8e54ad remove unused mbstring configuration and disable assertions in production by arabcoders
  • c9178897 update backend add/edit page to be more re-activate, added new option for plex backends, to mark user as guest. by arabcoders

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250513-57580fbc...master-20250518-1458e597

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250522-6d494bc0
entry.content:
• 9856ca78 Added URL Checker into tools menu. by arabcoders
  • fa4eda07 Filter every line output in the basic report to strip known sensitive information like accesstokens or apikeys. by arabcoders
  • 0102f56a Hide sub-users page when logged in as non-main user. by arabcoders
  • 689f6884 Add more php ini configuration options to make frankenphp behave like standard php-fpm by arabcoders

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250513-57580fbc...master-20250522-6d494bc0

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250523-42281eba
entry.content:
• b5386111 Add new generic webhook endpoint. by arabcoders
  • 82c1a8ef Update the guides pages. by arabcoders
  • 428e3eda Make it possible to cache metadata request cross users. by arabcoders
  • c053fe84 Make it possible to mark specific webhook events as generic that would trigger for all users who has the same backend setup. by arabcoders
  • d45eacdf Disable automatic release note generation and update package dependencies by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250525-c934375c
entry.content:
• 5d3d5644 When processing generic event, re-validate the metadata to prevent items which user doesn't have access to make it into his db. by arabcoders
  • 23e19f62 Support generic events more widely for plex client. by arabcoders
  • 3aef2ce9 Support generic events more widely for jellyfin&emby clients. by arabcoders
  • 3c7d1e6e Add Logger proxy class. by arabcoders
  • af688358 Document downsides of the new generic webhook system and caching behavior. by arabcoders
  • 666c6de4 Fix logged exception when a generic event trigger metadata httpException 404 by arabcoders
  • dd3833a7 When parsing webhook and requesting metadata from backend, before throwing error, check for IS_GENERIC and prevent expected error for generic events. by arabcoders
